content.heading: JavaScript Overview
paragraphs: JavaScript adds interactivity to HTML pages.

content.heading: <script> Tag
paragraphs: The <script> tag defines client-side JavaScript, either inline or via an external file, used for tasks like form validation and content updates.

content.heading: JavaScript Capabilities
paragraphs: JavaScript can modify content, styles, and attributes:

content.heading: <noscript> Tag
paragraphs: The <noscript> tag provides fallback content if JavaScript is disabled:

<script>
document.getElementById("demo").innerHTML = "Hello JavaScript!";
</script>
<noscript>Sorry, your browser does not support JavaScript!</noscript>
